sentences.en: A common purely mechanical integrator is the disk - roller type.
sentences.cn: 通用的纯粹机械的积分器是圆盘滚柱型.

sentences.en: A secretary can file papers as efficiently as a floppy disk can store them.
sentences.cn: 秘书归档文件时可以像软盘存储一样高效。

sentences.en: His gloved hand held up a computer disk.
sentences.cn: 他用那只戴着手套的手拿起一张光盘。

sentences.en: I can boot up from a floppy disk, but that's all.
sentences.cn: 我可以用一张软盘来启动，但其他的就无能为力了。

sentences.en: Make sure you back up the disk before you turn the computer off.
sentences.cn: 一定要先复制磁盘,然后再关电脑.

sentences.en: Nonvolatile solid - state memory is a lot more expensive than disk drives are.
sentences.cn: 不 丢失数据 的内存比硬盘的成本贵了很多,可靠的宽带网络则更加昂贵.

sentences.en: One CD-ROM disk can hold over 100,000 pages of text.
sentences.cn: 一张光盘可以存储十多万多页的文字资料。

sentences.en: Red blood cells are roughly the shape of a disk.
The company sends a service engineer to fix the disk drive before it fails.
sentences.cn: 公司派了一位维修工程师前去修理磁盘驱动器,以免其出故障.

sentences.en: The food processor has thin, medium, and thick slicing discs.
sentences.cn: 这个食品加工机有薄、中、厚的切片盘。

sentences.en: The image is then stored on the computer hard disk as a vast array of black or white dots.
sentences.cn: 这幅图像当时就以大量黑点或白点排列的形式被存入电脑硬盘。

sentences.en: The program takes up 2.5 megabytes of disk space and can be run on a standard personal computer.
sentences.cn: 这个程序占用2.5 兆字节的磁盘空间，可以在标准个人电脑上运行。

sentences.en: The program takes up 2.5 megabytes of disk space.
sentences.cn: 这个程序占用2.5兆的磁盘空间。

sentences.en: These discs hold more than 400 times as much information as a conventional computer floppy disk.
sentences.cn: 这些光盘能容纳的信息量是普通计算机软盘的400多倍。

sentences.en: They send a service engineer to fix the disk drive.
sentences.cn: 他们派出维修人员来修磁盘驱动器。

words.tran_cn: [计]磁盘，磁碟片；圆盘，盘状物；[电子]唱片

phrases.tran_cn: 盘式制动器；碟式刹车器

trans.tran_en: a small flat piece of plastic or metal which is used for storing computer or electronic information
